google.description: Search for similar images or sites containing your image on Google.

info.title: Google Command
info.description: Uses puppeteer to perform a Google reverse image search of your image. Works for most images. May not work for new OC or heavily edited images.
info.input: A direct link to your image. Must be a **direct** link. The link must be accessable for everyone.
info.output:
_Success_: First this will send an embed with clues from Google. Some keywords as well as the first <=5 images from the search will be shown alongside a screenshot of the search entries first page. Secondly this will send an embed containing the first <=5 sites which host your image.

_Error_: This will send an error embed for the image search, if no images are found. The second part of the success embed may be sent if some results are found.

help.description: Get an overview of all commands and information of each specific command.

info.title: Help Command
info.description: Gives you an overview of all commands or gives you more detailed information on a specific command.
info.input: Either nothing or the command name you want.
info.output:
_Overview_: Sends an embed containing basic information on all commands.

_Specfic Command_: Sends either an error embed (if you command doesn't exist) or an embed with detailed information on your command.

rps.description: Play rock paper scissors against the bot.

info.title: Rck Paper Scissors Command
info.description: Allows you to play rock paper scissors.
info.output: Sends a simple text displaying your choice, the enemies choice and a result.

saucenao.description: Search for the source of your image on SauceNao.

info.title: SauceNao Command
info.description: Uses the SauceNao API to perform a search on your image. Works best for Anime/Manga images as well as fanart, since SauceNao mostly searches sites that host those kind of images.
info.input:
A direct link to your image. Must be a **direct** link. The link must be accessable for everyone.

A number between 0 and 10 both inclusive. This will be the max amount of entries that are to be returned as embeds. Defaults to 5 entries if the number is not in this range or not given.
info.output:
_Success_: This will send <=5 embeds as a message containing the first <=5 entries on SauceNao.

_Error_: This will send an error embed with some information to what went wrong.

info.title: Sauces Command
info.description: From a list of sauces select one and this will send a recipe for such a sauce.
info.output: An embed describng how to create such a sauce at home.

tineye.description: Search for the source of your image on TinEye.

info.title: TinEye Command
info.description: Uses puppeteer to perform a TinEye reverse image search of your image. Works for most images. May not work for new OC or heavily edited images.
info.input:
A direct link to your image. Must be a **direct** link. The link must be accessable for everyone.

A number between 0 and 11 both inclusive. This will be the max amount of entries that are to be returned as embeds. Defaults to 5 entries if the number is not in this range or not given.
info.output:
_Success_: This will send the first <=amount matches that were found by TinEye as embeds.

_0 matches_: This will send an embed describing that no matches were found.

_Error_: This will send an error embed with some information on what went wrong.
